name: Rock, Paper, Scissors - Realistic Simulator
description:
This is a completely accurate simulator for playing rock paper scissors with your Spanish-speaking friend. Blow each other to pieces. 

=======================================================

CONTROLS: 

BACKSPACE - starts a new match

Player 1:

WASD - move 

F - rock

G - paper

H - scissors

SPACE - shift gravity

Player 2:

ARROWS - move 

K - rock

L - paper

; - scissors

ENTER - shift gravity

Shift gravity 3 times to recharge your rock.
